sentences.en: Brown bears are omnivorous, eating anything that they can get their paws on.
sentences.cn: 棕熊是杂食性动物，抓到什么吃什么。

sentences.en: However, suspicion would be caston this theory after cave bears were proved to be omnivorous.
sentences.cn: 但是, 如果证实了洞熊是杂食性动物,这种观点将受到质疑.

sentences.en: Like most of the omnivorous animals, they hibernated only after storing enough energy.
sentences.cn: 跟大多数杂食性动物, 它们只在储存了足够的能量后才冬眠.
人是肉类与蔬菜均食用的动物.

sentences.en: She has always been an omnivorous reader.
Some animals, including human beings, are omnivorous and eat both meat and vegetables; others are either carnivorous or herbivorous.
sentences.cn: 包括人在内的一些动物是杂食动物,既吃肉类,也吃蔬菜; 而其它动物则或是食肉动物,或是食草动物.

sentences.en: The carp has widely takes in food ability, is the omnivorous habit fish.
sentences.cn: 鲫鱼有着广泛的摄食能力, 属杂食性鱼类.

sentences.en: The painter has omnivorous exploratory gaze.
sentences.cn: 画家对任何事物都能有兴趣的探究性的盯着.

sentences.en: They are nomadic omnivorous, and roaming like a wild donkey.
sentences.cn: 他们恰像野驴一般居无定所 、 食无偏好、行踪飘忽.

sentences.en: They are, however , omnivorous although their preferred food is fruit. They will eat small and invertebrates.
sentences.cn: 它们是杂食性动物,最喜欢吃水果, 也吃些小动物昆虫.

sentences.en: To be omnivorous is one pole of true love; to be exclusive is the other.
sentences.cn: 真正的爱情, 一极是吸收一切,一极是排斥一切.

words.tran_cn: [动] 杂食动物；不偏食的人

trans.tran_cn: （尤指动物）杂食性的，肉草兼食的，对任何事物均感兴趣的，什么书都看的
trans.tran_en: interested in everything, especially in all books
